metadata.synopsis: Scientists and filmmakers explore the wreckage of the Titanic in the Atlantic in an examination of the doomed ocean liner.

reviews: Given the subject, this documentary is stunningly boring.
[Titanica] is based largely on footage filmed at the Titanic's grave. Seen on the giant, five-story, curving Omnimax screen of the Museum of Science and Industry, it is a sight to inspire awe.
